titleStmt.title: A posie of spirituall flowers taken out of the garden of the holy scriptures, consisting of these sixe sorts: hearts ease, true delight, the worlds wonders, the souls solace, times complaint, the doom of sinners. Gathered for the encouragement of beginners, direction of proceeders, meditation of good hearers, consolation of true beleeuers, expectation of Sions mourners, confusion of irrepentant sinners. By George Webbe, minister of the word.
titleStmt.author: Webbe, George, 1581-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by F. Kingston] for William Leake,

notesStmt.note: Six sermons, each with caption title: 1. A taste of happinesse. 2. True delight, or, the worlds farewell, and Christs welcome. 3. The worlds wonders. 4. The anchor of the soule. 5. The mourners lamentation. 6. The sinners doome.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
